scripts.say: C'mon, pay attention when people are talking to you, you grade schooler baby!
Who're you calling a grade schooler?! You STUPID MORONIC IDIOT!
Farewell, Honest Shion...
The hell are you bidding farewell to my clone for?! I'll destroy you!
Huh? That's it? I thought she'd stick around for longer.
This was the weakest enemy we've ever met.
It might have been weaker than the fake Aqua we met at the beginning.
Huh?! We're talking about the enemy! Shouldn't you be happy that the enemy's weak?
For some reason, it seems that the fake versions of all of us, Miss Sora excluded, have just been the victims of public executions...
Ahh, that's because all of these are facets that we've broadcasted of ourselves.
We still haven't encountered a fake version of me... Exactly what kind of character could it be... I'm become scared to find out...
It's a bit hard to come out and say this, but don't you guys feel that this is really a bit like reaping what you guys have sowed...?
Heeeh~ That's totally strange~ I wonder which aspect of Purifier I'm supposed to reflect~
... Haven't you just lost your memories. It's not like it makes any difference regardless of what kind of character you're supposed to be.
If it wasn't for this situation at hand, there's absolutely no way we'd be cooperating with you, who are a Purifier.
I will have you know that the moment you make the smallest movement with the intention of harming my comrades, my blade will have cleaved your very soul from your body.
Yeah, yeah. But seriously, I'm totally intrigued by this~ Y'know, stuff like passionate, INTEEEEEEENSE friendship, or a burning, intense development, or somethin'?
Save the sleeptalking for when you're asleep.
Anyway, thinking about Fake Shion's combat power, I think they should be/are likely to be avoiding direct combat with us.
So basically, what you're saying is that our encounters here were all by chance, and that there are probably other entrances out there.
I think I can sense some hope now!
Yep yep, it's still waaay too early to be giving up. There are still other entrances, so let's search other places for them!
